snippet: Congress on Wednesday launched a fact-finding mission into the loosely regulated world of fantasy sports games — a multibillion-dollar business that seemingly advertised everywhere during the pro football season....
lead_paragraph: Congress on Wednesday launched a fact-finding mission into the loosely regulated world of fantasy sports games — a multibillion-dollar business that seemingly advertised everywhere during the pro football season.

headline.main: Congress Putting Daily Fantasy Sports Games Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Congress Putting Daily Fantasy Sports Games Under Scrutiny
